name: Passion & Dream
description:
Team : Owen6936

A Point & Click game that You are god helper.

All you need to do is reply to an email.
Decided whose wish should be approved

Everyone has a dream.
But how many people who succeed?
Some people are lost it
or have been forced to leave it,
Because of norms and boundaries of society.
It’s a shame.
These passions could grow into something.
So your job is collect the passion and dream
that someone lose it, and return to them.

Make their dream come ture!
